channel.title: Install_Nginx_Third_Party_Modules :: Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: GeoIP2定位模块 GeoIP2模块依赖libmaxminddb库 GeoIP Legacy Databases libmaxminddb库 $ wget -c https://github.com/maxmind/libmaxminddb/releases/download/1.7.1/libmaxminddb-1.7.1.tar.gz -P /usr/local/src # 下载到指定目录下:-c断点续传、-P下载指定目录， $ tar -zxvf /usr/local/src/libmaxminddb-1.
